about_the_game:
Bolide is an arcade roguelike where you survive waves in space to unlock new skills! Completing waves earns you skill points, which are spent on a variety of skills! The full game contains lots of skill combinations, 40+ skills, 10 modes, 500+ customization options, lots of modifiers, and more, every game will be unique!

In this demo, you'll have access to tons of possible skill combinations, 4 modes, and more! Progress from the Demo will transfer to the full Bolide game!

Choose from 25 unique skills! Create new skill combinations every game! 

4 Game Modes Available! Try out Classic, Hardcore, Zen, and Limited Ammo Mode! You can also try out a modifier!

Over 100 Customization Options! Unlock new animated ships and customize your ship's color and supercharged status. Plus, unlock new bullets and customize their color and supercharged status.

Challenge Waves. Hard waves with unique modifiers that will make you want to rage.

Fully customizable keybinds. You can even bind multiple (or all) controls to a single key.

Accessibility features, including an option for a simplified font, disabling challenge waves, and more.

Amazing music by the award-winning composer Andrew Piland.

And more! Play the Bolide Demo today!
